name: 黃希敏
objective: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。

03  Yule 1: Definitions and background
04  HOLIDAY
05  Yule 2: Deixis and distance
06  Yule 3: Reference and inference
07  Yule 4: Presupposition and entailment
08  Yule 5: Cooperation and implication
09  Yule 6: Speech acts and events
10  APLX
11  Yule 7: Politeness and interaction
12  Yule 8: Conversation and preference structure
13  Yule 9: Discourse and culture + Peccei 1: What is Pragmatics
14  Presentation: You Think I am Stupid? Face Needs in Intercultural Conflicts.
Journal of Intercultural Communication, 2011.

16  HOLIDAY
17  Presentation:  Reader Ch 11. The pragmatic functions of the recitation of Qur’anic verses by Muslims in their oral genre: The case of Insha’ allah, ‘God’s willing’ + Ch 12. The silent Finn revisited
